duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage multiple design and construction projects of various sizes and types from conceptual development to construction, close-out, and occupancy.
Coordinate the work of cross-disciplinary internal teams and external contractors.
Create scopes of work, action plans, schedules, and budgets to support project success.
Ensure compliance with building codes, regulations, and sustainability standards.
Develop permit applications and manage the application process.
Review and evaluate project proposals, bids, and pay applications of external parties.
Identify challenges related to schedule, budget, progress, and safety, and propose solutions.
Communicate with staff and stakeholders to align on project goals and progress.
Maintain appropriate documentation and records to support project activities and complete close-out activities.
Recommend new or updated standards and guidelines for products, systems, and processes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Architecture, Engineering (Civil, Electrical, Mechanical, Structural), Interior Design, or Construction Management or related field (Master's preferred)
